TopicTitle: Kariner 2 - First Eve flyby - A very short movie

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I wanted to make a flyby video.. hope you like it!

Kariner 2 was the first robotic probe to successfully perform an Eve flyby. Launched on Year 2 Day 151, Kariner 2 flew by Eve on Year 2 Day 300 sending back to Kerbin the first black and white pictures of the planet's thick layer of clouds.

Note: Eve is not purple due to stock recolor mod from Sigma88.

Edited September 30, 2015 by Epox75
